summary: A suite of unit tests that verify the behavior and edge‑case handling of a neural type system, covering generic axes, void types, inheritance augmentation, nested list structures, parameterized audio sampling frequencies, version differences, singleton and struct types, transpose operations, and unspecified dimensions.
business_intent: Validate and safeguard the correctness of the neural type system to prevent type‑related bugs in machine‑learning pipelines and ensure reliable integration of type specifications across components.
